text: The Honda Prologue is an All-Electric SUV Made by Honda mainly for the North American market it was revealed in October 2022 and was put on sale in March 2024 its Honda's first major EV Following number of low volume battery electric vehicles previously sold by Honda like the Honda Clarity, Honda Fit, and the experimental Honda EV Plus it was developed in collaboration with General Motors and uses the BEV3 Platform and shares it with the Chevrolet Blazer EV Acura ZDX and The Cadillac Lyriq. == References == Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:Honda automobiles
title: Honda Prologue
